complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Core Infrastructure for SvelteKit and n8n Platform
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the setup of each infrastructure component (Git, Docker with SvelteKit, n8n, PostgreSQL, Redis, CI/CD, monitoring) into detailed steps
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate to high complexity due to SvelteKit and n8n integration setup; requires careful planning for development environment

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Minimal FastAPI Backend for Analytics
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail the implementation of focused analytics API features (auth, SaaS metrics, complex calculations) as separate subtasks
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity by focusing only on analytics; most CRUD operations handled by n8n workflows

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate the schema design, implementation, and optimization into individual subtasks
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving database design and performance tuning; natural division in design and implementation phases

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the SvelteKit development into UI components, Svelte stores, Tailwind styling, and key feature implementations
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity with SvelteKit's built-in features; simpler state management and better performance than React

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate n8n Workflow Engine as Primary Automation Layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the comprehensive n8n integration into workflow templates, CRUD operations, webhook system, and monitoring subtasks
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Increased complexity due to n8n handling 80% of operations; requires extensive workflow design and integration planning

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Lead Scoring and Enrichment via n8n Workflows
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate the implementation of n8n scoring workflows, enrichment processes, OpenAI integration, and Python ML components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity by leveraging n8n's built-in integrations; still complex due to ML components and multiple data sources

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Multi-Channel Outreach System via n8n Workflows
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the n8n outreach workflows into channel integrations, campaign automation, and analytics components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity using n8n's native channel integrations; logical division by outreach workflow types

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the dashboard creation into n8n data workflows, Python metric calculations, and SvelteKit visualization components
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity with SvelteKit's performance advantages and n8n handling data collection; cleaner separation of concerns

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement CRM Integrations via n8n Workflows
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate each CRM integration using n8n native nodes and create subtasks for bidirectional sync workflows
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Significantly reduced complexity using n8n's native CRM integrations; eliminates custom API development overhead

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop User and Team Management with n8n Automation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the user management into FastAPI access control, n8n automation workflows, and multi-tenancy implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Reduced complexity by automating team workflows with n8n; focus on core security and automation features
